name: Fineo - Banking App
description:
If a picture is worth a thousand words, imagine the impact of a short animation.


Fineo App helps you manage your personal finances. You can invest, transfer money, and review all your transactions anytime - all in a simple, intuitive form.


The power of the app lies in the ability of operating every possible currency in the world. Regardless of the number of them you own in your portfolio, you can easily switch between your accounts, track expenses at hand.


The whole experience is supported by top-notch quality interactions that makes this app even better and position it as the best alternative to your current banking app.


We hope you will enjoy it!


We're available for new projects! Drop us a line at ux@netguru.com.
